sentences.pinyin: Wǒ xūyào yòng diànfànguō zuò fàn.
sentences.translation: I need to use the electric rice cooker to cook.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我妈妈告诉我，电饭锅比传统的炒菜方法更省时省力。
sentences.traditionalText: 我媽媽告訴我，電飯鍋比傳統的炒菜方法更省時省力。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ māmā gàosù wǒ, diànfànguō bǐ chuántǒng de chǎocài fāngfǎ gèng shěng shí shěng lì.
sentences.translation: My mom told me that using an electric rice cooker is more time-saving and convenient than the traditional cooking method.
